Traits.Name: Sickly Aura
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Gas Breather must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Traits.Name: Gas Mask
Traits.Content: The Gas Breather has resistance to damage from gases and vapors. It cannot be blinded or poisoned.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Gas Breather makes two attacks with its Acidic Tendril action.

Actions.Name: Acidic Tendril
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 4) acid damage. If both attacks hit, the Gas Breather can impose disadvantage on the next attack roll against it until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Poisonous Cloud
Actions.Content: The Gas Breather releases a noxious cloud within a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 30 (4d12 + 4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The Gas Breather can use this action only once per short rest.
